attributes.action: firmly reject any proposal to grant the honour of a state funeral to Lady Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A state funeral indicates that the individual has not only rendered significant service to the country but is also held in high esteem by a majority of the people. Lady Thatcher, irrespective of any positive achievements, remains a divisive figure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
